channel.title: [bancraft] [1.6.2] [u.s. host] [survival] [mcmmo] [pvp] [economy] [factions]
channel.description:
[center][b][size=14pt]Bancraft 1.6.2 [74.91.112.155] ****[/size][/b] For those joining, you must register a password in the chatlog.
/register AnyPasswordOfYourChoosing AnyPasswordOfYourChoosing
And then you may:
/login ThePassWordOfYourChoosing
[b][size=14pt]****
About Us[/b]
[b]Bancraft is mature server for hardcore Minecraft players who believe that one is entitled to the sweat of his brow.
There is no parenting of chat and no gifting of materials. It is not for carebears, nor the feint of heart.
The map is still in its infancy and a several fallen faction bases lay unclaimed for the discovering and much of the land is ripe with resources for the taking.
Join alone or with friends, create a faction, claim land, forge alliances and wage wars upon your enemies. Defend your bases whilst laying waste to others.
Bancraft is seeking the best of the best; bandits, crafters, builders, and miners.
No application. No donations.
[size=14pt]Features[/size]
Rail systems connect all towns (which contain shops, arenas, and various attractions) Towns with shops and amenities (Newbie tutorial library, jump puzzles, dungeons, arenas) Use the currency system to trade with players or shops for difficult to attain items Griefers Hall of Fame, Wall of Shame, and McMMO Leaderboard Library with beginner tutorials for newbies Humiliation Box mIRC Chat (fem)Bot 9000 Veterans are invited to a voice chat server A drug mod that enhances the survival experience Adult atmosphere for those with a cynical sense of humor
In development and nearly complete:
Tristram (Diablo I recreation with dungeons and loot) Sealab (Recreation of Sealab 2021)
[size=14pt]Rules[/size]
The server is U.S. East hosted and administered by The_Potcat with one co-administrator. The rest of the players are members, there is no staff abuse.
Use common sense. No hacking or exploiting. No griefing of towns or rails. No spamming. Use common sense. There is a single Peaceful faction which is excluded from PvP and solely survival PvE. Looting, pillaging, plundering, raiding, ambushing, deceiving, lying, trapping, killing and maiming, are not only allowed, but encouraged.
[size=14pt]Mods[/size]
All the mods are server side, thus, no player will ever have to install any mods to connect. Ever.
Bukkit (Mainly server side stuff) McMMO (Adds RPG leveling and skill elements to players) Factions (Claim land, acquire allies, and wage wars) Drugs (In-game substance effects, /420!) Essentials (Special chat commands and features, e.g. mail) More Mobs [Bukkit] (New and special mobs) World Guard (Protection for towns and rails)
[size=14pt][b]Screenshots of Bancraft[/b][/size]
Treetown Town: Shops and arena. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img40/6672/k5q.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img703/3618/aexa.png[/img]
Goldenrod Tower: Town with shops and novelties. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img17/9295/53u3.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img826/9493/k93h.png[/img]
Gerudo Town: Novelty villager town with arena [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img22/1950/0a.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img33/2179/q2m.png[/img]
Flyingtown Town: Structures sold to factions as embassies. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img829/8311/r42r.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img4/4026/3kt6.png[/img]
Castletown Town: The kingdom of towns. Mega-city. Castle in mid-construction atop the mountain. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img268/8293/i6a4.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img585/4173/982.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img203/334/0ur4.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img29/4803/nh2o.png[/img]
Ghastly Arena: Inside Castletown's Nether with complimentary redstone trapdoors. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img96/4801/85c.png[/img]
We don't just build better than you build. We destroy better than you. Because we can. Communist Faction Base (Pillaged & Plundered in PvP raid) [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/117/ru7z.png[/img]
Mineguard Faction Base (Pillaged & Plundered in PvP war) [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img199/9083/qsr.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img35/316/zc7r.png[/img]
Justice Faction Base (Pillaged & Plundered in PvP assault): [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img689/2623/vjd.png[/img]

@Frailties wrote:

[center][size=14pt]Bancraft 1.6.2
[74.91.112.155]
****[/size]
For those joining, you must register a password in the chatlog.

/register AnyPasswordOfYourChoosing AnyPasswordOfYourChoosing

And then you may:

/login ThePassWordOfYourChoosing

[b][size=14pt]****

About Us[/b]

[b]Bancraft is mature server for hardcore Minecraft players who believe that one is entitled to the sweat of his brow.

There is no parenting of chat and no gifting of materials. It is not for carebears, nor the feint of heart.

The map is still in its infancy and a several fallen faction bases lay unclaimed for the discovering and much of the land is ripe with resources for the taking.

Join alone or with friends, create a faction, claim land, forge alliances and wage wars upon your enemies. Defend your bases whilst laying waste to others.

Bancraft is seeking the best of the best; bandits, crafters, builders, and miners.

No application. No donations.

[size=14pt]Features[/size]

Rail systems connect all towns (which contain shops, arenas, and various attractions)
Towns with shops and amenities (Newbie tutorial library, jump puzzles, dungeons, arenas)
Use the currency system to trade with players or shops for difficult to attain items
Griefers Hall of Fame, Wall of Shame, and McMMO Leaderboard
Library with beginner tutorials for newbies
Humiliation Box
mIRC Chat (fem)Bot 9000
Veterans are invited to a voice chat server
A drug mod that enhances the survival experience
Adult atmosphere for those with a cynical sense of humor

In development and nearly complete:

Tristram (Diablo I recreation with dungeons and loot)
Sealab (Recreation of Sealab 2021)

[size=14pt]Rules[/size]

The server is U.S. East hosted and administered by The_Potcat with one co-administrator. The rest of the players are members, there is no staff abuse.

Use common sense.
No hacking or exploiting.
No griefing of towns or rails.
No spamming.
Use common sense.
There is a single Peaceful faction which is excluded from PvP and solely survival PvE.
Looting, pillaging, plundering, raiding, ambushing, deceiving, lying, trapping, killing and maiming, are not only allowed, but encouraged.

[size=14pt]Mods[/size]

All the mods are server side, thus, no player will ever have to install any mods to connect. Ever.

Bukkit (Mainly server side stuff)
McMMO (Adds RPG leveling and skill elements to players)
Factions (Claim land, acquire allies, and wage wars)
Drugs (In-game substance effects, /420!)
Essentials (Special chat commands and features, e.g. mail)
More Mobs [Bukkit] (New and special mobs)
World Guard (Protection for towns and rails)

[size=14pt]Screenshots of Bancraft[/size]

Treetown Town: Shops and arena.

Goldenrod Tower: Town with shops and novelties.

Gerudo Town: Novelty villager town with arena

Flyingtown Town: Structures sold to factions as embassies.

Castletown Town: The kingdom of towns. Mega-city. Castle in mid-construction atop the mountain.



Ghastly Arena: Inside Castletown’s Nether with complimentary redstone trapdoors.

We don’t just build better than you build. We destroy better than you. Because we can.
Communist Faction Base (Pillaged & Plundered in PvP raid)

Mineguard Faction Base (Pillaged & Plundered in PvP war)

Justice Faction Base (Pillaged & Plundered in PvP assault):
